problemsub.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Subroutine to take in the problem number and call the appropriate problem
00003 !******************************************************************************
00004 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00005 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90     *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00006 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90  *CONTAINS VARIABLES USED IN THE PROGRAM
00007 ! VANDERPOL.F90          *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR VANDERPOL
00008 ! PURESCHI.F90           *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR PURESCHI & RUSSO
00009 ! KAPS.F90               *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR KAPS
00010 ! KREISS.F90             *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR KREISS'
00011 ! ROSSLER_CHAOS.F90      *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR Rossler_Chaos
00012 ! OREGONATOR.F90         *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR OREGONATOR
00013 ! BRUSSELATOR.F90        *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR BRUSSELATOR 
00014 ! BURGERS_MOD.F90        *PROBLEM CONSTANTS AND ROUTINES FOR BURGERS
00015 ! BOSCARINO31_MOD.F90    *PROBLEM CONSTANTS AND ROUTINES FOR BOSCARINO-31
00016 !******************************************************************************
00017       module problemsub_mod
00018       
00019       use precision_vars,    only: wp      
00020       use control_variables, only: programstep
00021       
00022       implicit none;save
00023       
00024       private
00025       public :: problemsub
00026       
00027       contains
00028       
00029       subroutine problemsub(iprob,nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,time,akk,L)
00030 
00031       use control_variables, only: resE,resI,uvec
00032       use vanderPol_mod,     only: vanderPol
00033       use Pureschi_mod,      only: Pureschi
00034       use Kaps_mod,          only: Kaps
00035       use Kreiss_mod,        only: Kreiss
00036       use Lorenz_mod,        only: Lorenz
00037       use Rossler_mod,       only: Rossler_Chaos
00038       use Oregonator_mod,    only: Oregonator
00039       use Brusselator_mod,   only: Brusselator
00040       use Burgers_Module,    only: Burgers
00041       use Boscarino31_Mod,   only: Boscarino31
00042       use Broadwell_Mod,     only: Broadwell
00043    
00044       !PROBLEM PARAMETERS
00045       integer,  intent(in   ) :: iprob
00046       integer,  intent(  out) :: nveclen
00047       integer,  intent(  out) :: neq
00048       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: ep
00049       real(wp), intent(inout) :: dt
00050       real(wp), intent(  out) :: tfinal
00051       integer,  intent(in   ) :: iDT
00052       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: time
00053       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: akk
00054       integer,  intent(in   ) :: L
00055       real(wp), dimension(size(uvec)) :: resE_vec,resI_vec
00056 
00057       if     (iprob==1)  then
00058        call vanderPol(    nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00059       elseif (iprob==2)  then
00060        call Pureschi(     nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00061       elseif (iprob==3)  then
00062        call Kaps(         nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00063       elseif (iprob==4)  then
00064        call Kreiss(       nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,time,resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00065       elseif (iprob==5)  then 
00066        call Lorenz(       nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00067       elseif (iprob==6)  then 
00068        call Rossler_Chaos(nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00069       elseif (iprob==7)  then 
00070        call Oregonator(   nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00071       elseif (iprob==8)  then 
00072        call Brusselator(  nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00073       elseif (iprob==9)  then
00074        call Burgers(      nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,time,resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00075       elseif (iprob==10) then
00076        call Boscarino31(  nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00077       elseif (iprob==11) then
00078        call Broadwell(    nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00079       else
00080        print*,'Invalid problem number!'
00081        stop
00082       endif
00083       
00084       select case(programstep)
00085         case('BUILD_RHS')  
00086           resE(:,L)=resE_vec(:)
00087           resI(:,L)=resI_vec(:)
00088       end select
00089 
00090       end subroutine problemsub
00091 
00092       end module problemsub_mod
